title: We judging it requisite for His Majesties service, that all officers and souldiers of the army in this kingdom, do according to their duty, constantly remain in their respective garrisons and quarters ... by the Lord Lieutenant General and General Governour of Ireland, Essex.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,
